Ancient History in a Modern University. Proceedings of a Conference Held at Macquarie University, 8-13 July 1993 to mark twenty-five years of the teaching of Ancient History at Macquarie University and the retirement from the Chair of Professor Edwin Judge. bibl.seg: NOBBS Alanna M., Formulas of Belief in Greek Papyrus Letters of the Third and Fourth Centuries.

Proceedings of a Conference Held at Macquarie University, 8-13 July 1993 to mark twenty-five years of the teaching of Ancient History at Macquarie University and the retirement from the Chair of Professor Edwin Judge.
